member_organisations: Tusk Task Force is a not member of any governing organisation or association but is partnered with a coalition of organisations that collaborate with us to complete our collective mission to defend and protect wildlife worldwide. The list of our partners may be found on this link: http://www.tusktaskforce.org/partners/
fields_of_interest: Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Our main consultative interests in engaging the European Union focuses on policy areas related to Climate Action, Environment, Wildlife Conservation, Nature, and Global Security (affecting nature and wildlife conservation).
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Founded in 2014, Tusk Task Force is a United States incorporated non-profit (IRS 501c3 status-pending) global wildlife conservation NGO based in Seattle. Our mission is to abolish all wildlife violence and exploitation worldwide by providing strategic and tactical resources—advocacy, intelligence, and protection—to all stakeholders that defend them so that wildlife may live. We collaborate with other organisations whose mission is relevant to ours, worldwide.
relevant_communication: More information on recent implementation, public relations, and communication activities and programming may be found by clicking on the link: http://www.tusktaskforce.org/what-we-do/
